unnormalised: The recent reshuffle in the UP govt has everyone talking, especially about the new DM posted to Kanpur. Turns out it's Ms. Sunita Devi, IAS, a real go-getter, if what I hear is true. She’s only 35 yrs old, which is pretty young for such a big responsibility, right?
normalised: The recent reshuffle in the U-P government has everyone talking, especially about the new D-M posted to Kanpur. Turns out it's Ms. Sunita Devi, I-A-S, a real go-getter, if what I hear is true. She’s only thirty five years old, which is pretty young for such a big responsibility, right?

unnormalised: Apparently, she's been Jt. Magistrate in Varanasi and CDO in Allahabad before. People are saying she really turned things around in those districts. They were facing issues with MGNREGA scheme implementation, and she got everything sorted ASAP. Heard she even pulled up a few BDOs for not doing their jobs properly. Good on her, I say!
normalised: Apparently, she's been Joint Magistrate in Varanasi and C-D-O in Allahabad before. People are saying she really turned things around in those districts. They were facing issues with M-G-N-R-E-G-A scheme implementation, and she got everything sorted as soon as possible. Heard she even pulled up a few B-D-Os for not doing their jobs properly. Good on her, I say!

unnormalised: My uncle, who works as a clerk in the tehsil office, mentioned that she's known for being super strict about deadlines. "No file should stay on anyone’s desk for more than 24 hrs," he quoted her as saying. Imagine that! Some of those babus are used to taking weeks to process things. Hopefully, she'll bring some much-needed efficiency to Kanpur’s administration.
normalised: My uncle, who works as a clerk in the tehsil office, mentioned that she's known for being super strict about deadlines. "No file should stay on anyone’s desk for more than twenty four hours," he quoted her as saying. Imagine that! Some of those babus are used to taking weeks to process things. Hopefully, she'll bring some much-needed efficiency to Kanpur’s administration.

unnormalised: Of course, there are whispers of some political interference already. A certain MLA, Mr. Sharma, apparently tried to get her to favor his constituents in a land dispute. But from what I gather, she didn’t budge. Seems like she’s got integrity.
normalised: Of course, there are whispers of some political interference already. A certain M-L-A, Mister Sharma, apparently tried to get her to favor his constituents in a land dispute. But from what I gather, she didn’t budge. Seems like she’s got integrity.

unnormalised: The previous DM, Mr. A.K. Singh, IPS (on deputation), wasn’t exactly known for being decisive. Things were moving at a snail's pace. Remember that bridge project near the Ganga? Still hasn't been completed after 5 yrs. Let’s hope Ms. Devi prioritizes those infrastructural projects.
normalised: The previous D-M, Mister A. K. Singh, I-P-S (on deputation), wasn’t exactly known for being decisive. Things were moving at a snail's pace. Remember that bridge project near the Ganga? Still hasn't been completed after five years. Let’s hope Ms. Devi prioritizes those infrastructural projects.

unnormalised: The biggest challenge will be tackling the city's notorious corruption, I think. Kanpur's municipal corporation has been embroiled in so many scams over the years. Even the Commissioner, Mr. Verma, had to face an inquiry a while back. The locals tell me that bribery is rife, especially when getting permits or licenses.
normalised: The biggest challenge will be tackling the city's notorious corruption, I think. Kanpur's municipal corporation has been embroiled in so many scams over the years. Even the Commissioner, Mister Verma, had to face an inquiry a while back. The locals tell me that bribery is rife, especially when getting permits or licenses.

unnormalised: Anyway, fingers crossed that Ms. Sunita Devi, IAS, brings about positive change. Kanpur needs a strong leader who can get things done. Let’s give her a chance and see if she lives up to the hype. Maybe, just maybe, we’ll finally see some progress. And hopefully my uncle won't get shouted at for taking too long over the files! Let’s see what happens before Diwali.
normalised: Anyway, fingers crossed that Ms. Sunita Devi, I-A-S, brings about positive change. Kanpur needs a strong leader who can get things done. Let’s give her a chance and see if she lives up to the hype. Maybe, just maybe, we’ll finally see some progress. And hopefully my uncle won't get shouted at for taking too long over the files! Let’s see what happens before Diwali.
